code: import{axiosInstance,url}from"./index";export const getLoggedUser=async()=>{try{const response=await axiosInstance.get(url+'api/user/get-logged-user');return response.data;}catch(error){return error;}};export const getAllUsers=async()=>{try{const response=await axiosInstance.get(url+'api/user/get-all-users');return response.data;}catch(error){return error;}};export const uploadProfilePic=async image=>{try{const response=await axiosInstance.post(url+'api/user/upload-profile-pic',{image});return response.data;}catch(error){return error;}};
